entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Is it possible to make static fields to bind in VS debugger? #89219
  • Assembly.LoadFrom throws exception when loading System.Private.CoreLib.dll #89215
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor to a virtual method on a base class through a derived type asserts #89212
    8.0.0
  • NU5129 error for System.Resources.Extensions package #89208
  • Unnecessary suppression errors showing up in build using .NET 8 Preview 7 SDK #89206
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Test failures in System.Net.Http.Json.Unit.Tests #89195
  • dotnet.exe hangs on exit due to icu.dll #89194
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Assertions in InterproceduralScan while building libraries tests #89191
  • Android on-device tests that fail under LLVM #89190
    8.0.0
  • Setup emulator for TPM/HSM testing #89183
    Future
  • OOM on outerloop-linux runs of runtime-libraries-coreclr pipeline on System.Runtime.Tests and System.Runtime.Numerics.Tests #89173
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Refactor `System.Linq.Expressions` private feature switches #89171
    8.0.0
  • How can I use system.web as a configuration section in a asp.net net472 app that uses System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #89169
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `System.Linq.Expressions` tests on iOS-like platforms #89168
    8.0.0
  • OpenSSL provider support #89167
    9.0.0
  • Process crashed with Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #89165
    Future
  • SslStream throws "RemoteCertificateNameMismatch" when using ipaddress as Sni for ssl handshake #89163
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpMethod.From(string) #89161

Closed

  • `System.Tests.PosixSignalRegistrationTests.SignalCanCancelTermination` is occasionally failing on macOS #63760
    8.0.0
  • Fail nicely for non-blittable function pointer signatures #40908
    8.0.0
  • Test the old FabricBot is up again #89218
  • VerificationException static virtual interface methods, and generic constraints #78865
    8.0.0
  • VerificationException with reflection, static abstract interface methods, and generic constraints #73658
    8.0.0
  • Loader\classloader\StaticVirtualMethods\RegressionTests\GetInterfaceMapWithStaticVirtualsAndConstraints fails in NativeAOT #89122
  • NetworkInterface.GetPhysicalAddress().GetAddressBytes() seems problematic with LLVM enabled on Android x86_64 #75155
    8.0.0
  • [tests][Android] LargeHeaders_TrickledOverTime_ProcessedEfficiently Insufficient Memory #77474
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Assert crashes app #79395
    8.0.0
  • AppHost.Bundle.Tests Test host process crashed on Linux x64 Release CoreCLR Installer Build and Test #82202
  • Things needing System.Net.Security.Native may not work on Bionic #87665
  • Assertion failed in System.Text.Json tests coming from Globalization #89200
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Build failure: System.IO.Ports.Native.so.dbg not found on disk #89201
    8.0.0
  • `.\build.cmd -subset clr+libs -config release` fails in `ConfigurationBindingGenerator` #88918
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Implement support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #86438
    8.0.0
  • Custom pooling AsyncMethodBuilder #78064
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbCodeOffs <= succBlock->bbCodeOffs' #88348
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change Console Startup Messages #78689
    Future
  • [mono] Tests `System.Net.Sockets.Tests.Connect*` failing with `Can't assign requested address` #89166
    8.0.0
  • DI behavior change between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 #88968
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates code that doesn't compile for [Out] blittable arrays #88708
    8.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] Failure for another complex expression #85611
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json work planned for .NET 8 #77020
    8.0.0
  • Connect_DatagramSockets_DontThrowConnectedException_OnSecondAttempt fails on iOS #89055
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Deserialization issue when consuming ASMX Web Service #80935
    8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] SocketException : Can't assign requested address [::]:0 #89180
    8.0.0
  • Test build fails with "libSystem.IO.Ports.Native.so.dbg' to be packed was not found on disk." #89146
  • Regression in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4.TransformBenchmark #88377
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 13 Regressions on 7/1/2023 10:14:52 PM #88376
    8.0.0
  • Instantiating ValueTuple<int, int, int> significantly more expensive than ValueTuple<int, int> or equivalent struct #89170
  • [API Proposal]: A more nuanced story for Dependency Injection #83666
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger performance of operators `+`, `-` and `*` can be improved when both arguments are trivial #84721
  • [Mono]: test_0_ldvirtftn_generic_method in generics.cs crash in Full AOT + Interp mode. #89076
  • Half.TryParse assertion failure on System.Globalization.Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCaseUtf8_Scalar #89094
  • Configuration binding source generator fails with CS8598 error #89010
    8.0.0
  • Unable to publish NativeAOT project for linux-bionic-arm64 #87340
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue references in ConvertToLibraryImportAnalyzerTests #89225
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Reduce ProbabilisticWithAsciiCharSearchValues overhead on non-ASCII texts #89224
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add the interop tags to the "add to the AppModel project" automation #89221
    area-Meta
  • Virt call unsafe accessor tests #89220
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP] UnsafeAccessor: Support ambiguous method match #89217
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Address unused suppressions #89216
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable CLS Compliance on Diagnostics Libraries #89214
    area-System.Diagnostics, 8.0.0
  • Convert all user calls to indirect early on arm64 #89213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] BigInteger.Divide perf optimization #89211
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add more tests for complex dict element binding by generator #89210
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Broaden use of SearchValues in TryFindNextPossibleStartingPosition in Regex #89205
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HttpClientFactory] Add tests for all simple SocketsHttpHandler properties #89202
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Emit a diagnostic when attributes deriving from JsonConverterAttribute are being used. #89199
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Bump word-wrap from 1.2.3 to 1.2.4 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #89198
    area-DependencyModel, javascript
  • [AndroidAppBuilder] add missing includes to template #89197
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • Try to improve EventSource_ParallelRequests_LogsNewConnectionIdForEachRequest reliability #89192
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Efcore issue 31178 #89185
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Move full facade assemblies into src/libraries/shims #89184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wip][mono][tests] Fix Mono AOT compiler failing build on linux-arm64 #89182
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Expand inlined delegate calls in correct order #89175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Point ActiveIssues to moved issues #89158
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Unsafe.IsAddressLess/GreaterThanOrEqualTo methods #89156
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Bump main version to RC1 #89151
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update UserTypeMarshallingV2.md #89222
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix the default behavior to trim the RCW interop by default #89128
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add a SearchValues ProbabilisticMap implementation that uses an ASCII fast path #89155
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Add support for default implementation of static virtuals with method constraints #89061
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Build less of libs for CoreCLR tools tests #89154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix duplicated assets in official build #89188
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Bump package version for net7 to 7.0.10 #89209
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Share SourceWriter between JSON & config binding generators #89196
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements #89193
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Fix bug in EqualsIgnoreCaseUtf8_Scalar #89174
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Share SourceWriter between JSON & config binding generators #89150
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add Driver.Context setter #89081
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Clean up debugger attributes tests. #89011
    area-Debugger-mono, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clamp basic block IL ranges when splitting blocks #89179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix OSX like Test Failure on Socket.Connect #89187
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Fix EqualsIgnoreCaseUtf8_Scalar #89152
    area-System.Globalization
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Fix duplicated assets in official build #89189
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Use script instead of powershell to set DOTNET_ROOT #89123
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements #89117
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix failures around blittable collections with [Out] and chars #89149
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Ensure last-use copy omission candidates are marked with GTF_GLOB_REF #89088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid generating internal static classes with constant names in Options Source gen #89148
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix outerloop tests in System.Formats.Tar #89172
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Fix broken runtime tests build (second attempt) #89178
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Fix memory leaks for interpreted dynamic methods. #88892
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Use source generator for results data json serialization #89177
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [libs][iOS] Unify `System.Linq.Expression.dll` build for all platforms #88723
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Fix broken runtime tests build (second attempt) #89176
    needs-area-label
  • Remove unnecessary closures from Logging{Scope}HttpMessageHandler.SendCoreAsync #89160
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Expose `MarkStep.ScopeStack` #89120
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix ILVerifier holding files open #89127
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix building the reproNative.vcxproj project #89159
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Register static rgctx trampolines in the JIT info tables. #89142
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute xml documentation. #89082
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Disable the "casts between generated and built-in COM interop" analyzer when the "enable interop between generated COM interop and built-in COM interop" feature is enabled. #89125
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Add docs on using Bionic with NativeAOT #88817
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Finish fixing PerfBDNApp, continuation of #89057 #89135
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use utf conversions from minipal #89036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unbox a true nullable without Opcodes.Unbox #89108
    area-System.Reflection
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on store if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter or struct field #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 #88772
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Support new JMC #86815
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix GetArgLoc #88657
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix incorrect nativeaot event thread / sequence number on shutdown #88941
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix TestGenericAddStaticField #89145
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-author-action, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Allow download retry+throttling in unified code with blazor #88910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move the IsLeft/IsRight decision out of the loop #88516
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • adding clrgc variant with regions enabled #89129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Avoid calling GC write barrier for byrefs #89064
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid calling GC write barrier for byrefs [#89064 + more HasGCByRef logic] #89116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes for outerloop-mono.yml #88743
    area-Build-mono
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix NaN canonicalization issue #88510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add FileAttributes.None #89130
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid extra console write for clearing on Unix #89026
    area-System.Console
  • Remove incorrect flag setting #88878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
